About Us

Gionatan Freitas: Author of the Landing Page

Hi, I’m Gionatan. I’m passionate about making coding visually engaging and fun, especially through YouTube and digital branding. I took this AI class to explore how artificial intelligence can show creativity, simplify complex ideas, and connect with audiences in fresh, meaningful ways. Whether I’m designing video games or crafting educational content, I love blending tech with storytelling.

Hi my name is Tushar Chatterjee and a little bit about me is that I am very interested in coding and very interested on how AI is used in the real world. A few games I play is clash royale and minecraft, A sport I do is swim, and the school I go to is Innovation Academy. The main reason why I joined the AI course is because I'm fascinated by how machines can learn and make decisions. I wanted to understand the technology behind things like chatbots, self-driving cars, and recommendation systems—and maybe even build something cool myself one day. Plus, I know AI is going to be a huge part of the future, and I want to be ready for it.
